name: @codedv8/dynamicconfig
description: Dynamic configuration storage that can use files and/or environment. Different sets of configuration can be used. Configuration files can have a fallback configuration file. Getting values from the configuration can have a default value or can throw an error if not found.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run minify
scripts.examples: npm run example:basic && npm run example:basic:env && npm run example:basic:ini && npm run example:basic:env:ini && npm run example:envpopulate && npm run example:fuse && npm run example:merge && npm run example:setconfig && npm run example:setconfig2 && npm run example:totype
